title: Can Alaphilippe Help Tudor Make the Cut for the 2025 Tour de France?
content:
Fabian Cancellara's Swiss project could be on the fast track to race the Tour de France in just its third season in the pro ranks. Will ASO deliver?

Read the full article at Can Alaphilippe Help Tudor Make the Cut for the 2025 Tour de France? on Velo.
author: ahood
